remarks: Property of a state.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isst $p |- ( S e. States <-> ( S : CH --> ( 0 [,] 1 ) /\ ( S ` ~H ) = 1 /\ A. x e. CH A. y e. CH ( x C_ ( _|_ ` y ) -> ( S ` ( x vH y ) ) = ( ( S ` x ) + ( S ` y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d S x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
